name: places/ChIJaUMtUCBawokRZZZEcg0m4gs
adrFormatAddress: 344 Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: Stay away at all cost!!  They will ruin your clothes and take your money.  I hate to say bad things about a small business, but I gave them so many chances to fix pants that shrunk and they denied denied denied and never offered to replace.  Almost feel scammed as they were robotic in their responses.  AVOID!!!!!

originalText.text: Terrible experience , I brought a pair of pants to get the legs shorten . I thought the person taking in my pants in would write down notes but no . She said she know what needed to be done .  I picked up my pants a few days later . I tried them on and they looked and felt off . I told them that the pants were not sewn right the hem looks awful and one leg is shorter then the other . I pointed this out to the worker behind the counter and tailor who worked on my pants , he was there . They both kept making up excuse how it was the pants material . I was there for 20 minutes telling them they need to fix the pants that they were not sewn right. They just kept making up excuse . I eventually left since I had  work and it was like talking to a wall with those two . I was never able to wear the pants for the event I needed them for. I had to go out and buy new ones that worked with my outfit. They Ruined the pair of pants I had them shorten initially. Terrible experience . I would not recommend ! If I could give them a negative star I would .

originalText.text: The men here have come through for me so many times! They are kind and caring and truly care about their customers.  I had to get a dress altered for my sister-in-laws wedding last minute and they not only rushed the alterations, but could see how stressed out I was and let me come in early before they officially opened so I could try it on before work just in case I felt more work needed to be done.  Another time they walked me through the potential risks involved with washing a particular stained garment so I felt comfortable with the process.  Of course they garment came out perfectly! I can't say enough positive things about this place.  Not only quality of service but really nice people too!!

originalText.text: Used them for same day turnaround wash and fold services, which was $13.50 for the first 10lbs at time of writing this review. Staff were polite and got my laundry back with no issues. They also took all major credit cards, which made payment very easy as well.

text.text: Used them for same day turnaround wash and fold services, which was $13.50 for the first 10lbs at time of writing this review. Staff were polite and got my laundry back with no issues. They also took all major credit cards, which made payment very easy as well.

originalText.text: They seem to just refold your dry cleaning and give it back to you instead of actually dry cleaning it. Multiple times I have received back dry cleaning that smells worse than when I dropped it off.
